external_games.name: Deal With The Devil: Chapter 1 - Journey to Tuonela
Deal With The Devil: Chapter 1 - Journey to Tuonela

name: Deal With The Devil: Chapter 1 - Journey to Tuonela
storyline: John, a father who has experienced a tragic loss, encounters a supernatural entity that wants to make a deal with him. This entity needs John's help to gain access to Tuonela, where there are disturbing disturbances in the movement of souls. Only the soul of a grieving living person can help the entity find answers and restore balance between the realms.
summary: A dark and mysterious adventure that takes players on a journey through Finnish mythology and the mysteries of Tuonela. Players guide John through the adventure in Tuonela, encountering characters from Finnish mythology and other mythological creatures.
